conversation.message: We are highly interested in joining Nursery_B, which is our preferred choice. We formally submit our application for a position.

Since Nursery_B has capacity 1 and I am their top priority, applying immediately will guarantee a match with my rank 1 choice in Round 1. I will use the [APPLY] tag.
